ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Im going to interpret most powerful as most versatile :) Bards of course. They can heal, do damge, tank so so, levitate, invis, track, sneak, safe fall,
ygData.messageBody:
Im going to interpret most powerful as most versatile :)
Bards of course. They can heal, do damge, tank so so, levitate, invis, track,
sneak, safe fall, teleport, charm,run damn fast, mez,...the list goes on and
on. If there were some sort of obstacle course lets say, a stretch of
nothing, then water, then many low level agro's, some more water, then the
need to find someone in a crowd quickly, then a decent sized fall, followed
up by killing some sort of monster. What class would win? The bard of course,
he can do all that and more easily (im thinking of say a 40 bard and 40 other
clasess). All the classes that can lev have to swim in the water, all the
classes that cant run fast lose time during the runs, those that cant invis
get beat on by the lil mobbies; See what im going at here?
Anyways, just my lil thoughts

Renaldo Rallentando (who in no way lets the fact that he's a bard bias any
oppinions :P )
